title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Phone Call with President Emmanuel Macron of France – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
June 27, 2017
President Donald J. Trump spoke today with President Emmanuel Macron of France to congratulate the French people on France’s successful parliamentary elections. President Trump complimented President Macron for his leadership of the new political party that secured a majority in the French National Assembly and wished him luck in launching his legislative agenda. The two leaders also discussed the current situation in the Middle East and reviewed the agenda for the upcoming G20 Summit.
